definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
Samuel Johnson (1709-1784) or Dr Johnson, English writer and lexicographer
pinyin: Sai1 miu4 er3 · Yue1 han4 xun4

sentences.english: I think there's a walleye on that one, " said Johnson."
sentences.chinese: “我认为有一个白斑上的，”约翰逊说。

sentences.english: Entonces tu ídolo pasaba por Magic Johnson o Larry Bird.
sentences.chinese: 那你一定喜欢魔术师约翰逊和拉里伯德了。

sentences.english: I'm a resident of Rose Park on St. Johnson Street.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个居住在圣约翰逊街玫瑰花园的居民。

sentences.english: He had made up his mind that Johnson was guilty, and he steamrollered anyone who disagree with him.
sentences.chinese: 他已经认定约翰逊有罪，并迫使任何持异议者就范。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson was known as a walking dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊先生被称作一本活字典。

sentences.english: Johnson’s brazenness put him in the crosshairs of the U.S. government.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊的狂妄不羁使他被美国政府盯上了。

sentences.english: Oh, great. Dr. Johnson will be available on Friday afternoon this week.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，约翰逊大夫本周星期五下午有空。

sentences.english: Dr. Joh on will be available on Friday afternoon this week.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊大夫本周周五有空。

sentences.english: Johnson is superior to Mr. Wang in mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊的数学比王先生好。

sentences.english: Hooker again, managed to make his way toward the bunker, where Johnson and Dingee were.
sentences.chinese: 胡克再次跑回了约翰逊和迪丹吉掩体。

sentences.english: We were thinking of asking you and Mr. Johnson to go to the Great wall.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算请您和您约翰逊先生登长城。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson, do you have a lawyer to handle the legal work for you?
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊先生，你已委托了律师为你办理手续吗？

sentences.english: Johnson likes watching TV very much. So does his sister Cathy.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊非常喜欢看电视，他的妹妹凯希也是。

sentences.english: Its name is Johnson International Fastfood Co. Limited.
sentences.chinese: 公司名称是“约翰逊国际快餐有限公司”。

sentences.english: Mr. Johnson: Bre you using you mower thellos afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊师长教师今全国午你筹办用割草机吗？

sentences.english: And so I want to quote Dr. Johnson here, and this is on the handout.
sentences.chinese: 在这里我想引用约翰逊博士，这在讲义上有。

pinyin: Sha1 kui2 er3 · Ao4 ni2 er3

definition: Brown (name)/Gordon Brown (1951-), UK politician, prime minister 2007-2010
